channel.title: Matrix 718/723 client connection error (my ip)
channel.description: Okay so I am here with a big problem... I have portforwarded my router and I change the loader.java Ip to my ip and... when I start the server and open the client it is stuck at 0% and I can't figure out why it would be doing this? I can't even connect too my own ip address and i'm wanting too fix this so me and my friends can really start coding because I can't do everything by myself I need help of course BUT, would someone please help me fix this? So I can have my friends connect and help me with the server? Please and thank you!

item.title: Matrix 718/723 client connection error (my ip)
item.dc:creator: @PIEBAR2FAR PIEBAR2FAR
item.description:
@PIEBAR2FAR wrote:

also because its 718 do you have the cache in your data file?

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718/723 client connection error (my ip)
item.dc:creator: @darkzcap3 darkzcap3
item.description:
@darkzcap3 wrote:

as PIEBAR2FAR said get the cache and put it into the C: drive of yours, also check if you have updated all jave to jre7 and jdk1.7.X_XX, check that you dont got programs that can disturb your Port/IP like Utorrent and check the Run.bat file on client that its at jre7 java and not running on any jdk

Here is my 728 zenith Run.Bat

@echo off
@title Run 667/728 client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -
Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath
bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader
pause

Read full topic

item.description:
@PIEBAR2FAR wrote:

item.title: Matrix 718/723 client connection error (my ip)
item.dc:creator: @k2_k0 k2 k0
item.description:
@k2_k0 wrote:

Okay so I am here with a big problem… I have portforwarded my router and I change the loader.java Ip to my ip and… when I start the server and open the client it is stuck at 0% and I can’t figure out why it would be doing this? I can’t even connect too my own ip address and i’m wanting too fix this so me and my friends can really start coding because I can’t do everything by myself I need help of course BUT, would someone please help me fix this? So I can have my friends connect and help me with the server? Please and thank you!

Read full topic
